Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Cottage Grove due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Cottage Grove due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #4 Cottage Grove
  • #63 63rd

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
